invalidModeValueOnStartApplication.messsage: The mode defined on 'App::start' is invalid

applicationAlreadyStartedOnStartApplicat.messsage: You can not restart application before starting the application

applicationNotYetStartedOnFinishExecutio.messsage: You can not finish execution before starting the application
applicationNotYetStartedOnFinishExecutio.observation: When you run 'App::finish' if the database connection is open, it will be closed and after the execution will be finished

applicationNotYetStartedOnVerifyIfIsInDe.messsage: You can not verify that you are in development mode before you start the application
applicationNotYetStartedOnVerifyIfIsInDe.observation: You can also use 'App::isProdMode' to check if there is no production mode

applicationNotYetStartedOnVerifyIfIsInPr.messsage: You can not verify that you are in production mode before you start the application
applicationNotYetStartedOnVerifyIfIsInPr.observation: You can also use 'App::isDevMode' to check if there is no development mode
